nodes.text: J'ber V'Sook was a small Gorothite j'ber that, in the wake of the Scouring, created a religious philosophy known as M'Nes, or the "True Faith." The religion was first preached by V'Sook M'Alra Vin, and spread across Goroth Prime over the centuries. J'ber V'Sook was considered to be the M'Nes Brin ("Receptacle of the True Faith"), and all of the female members of the j'ber were known as K'Kela Mey ("Mothers of the True Faith").
